TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientScriptManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義用來管理 Web 應用程式中用戶端指令碼的方法。

span.span: Defines methods for managing client scripts in Web applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來管理用戶端指令碼，並將它們加入至 Web 應用程式。The class is used to manage client scripts and add them to Web applications. 您可以取得的參考類別從屬性物件。You can get a reference to the class from the property of the object. 您可以將用戶端指令碼加入網頁以宣告方式在頁面的 HTML 標記中包含指令碼。You can add a client script to a Web page declaratively by including the script in the HTML markup of the page. 不過，有很多情況下以動態方式加入用戶端指令碼會在需要時。However, there are situations when adding client script dynamically is needed. 若要以動態方式加入指令碼，使用方法，方法，方法，或方法，會根據時間和方式想要新增指令碼。To add a script dynamically, use the method, the method, the method, or the method, depending on when and how you want to add the script. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 加入用戶端指令碼以動態方式以 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e89f1306-e43d-49ae-a66a-e18b71007666)。For more information, see [How to: Add Client Script Dynamically to ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e89f1306-e43d-49ae-a66a-e18b71007666). 類別唯一識別指令碼，依索引鍵和。The class uniquely identifies scripts by a key and a . 具有相同索引鍵和類型的指令碼會被視為重複。Scripts with the same key and type are considered duplicates. 使用指令碼類型有助於避免混淆類似的指令碼可能會在頁面上的使用中的不同使用者控制項。Using the script type helps to avoid confusing similar scripts from different user controls that might be in use on the page. 類別可以用來叫用用戶端回呼的情況下，最好從用戶端執行伺服端程式碼，但未執行回傳時。The class can be used to invoke client callbacks in situations when it is desirable to run server code from the client without performing a postback. 這被指執行超出訊號範圍回呼伺服器。This is referred to as performing an out-of-band callback to the server. 在用戶端回呼，用戶端指令碼函式會傳送至 ASP.NET 網頁的非同步要求。In a client callback, a client script function sends an asynchronous request to an ASP.NET Web page. Web 網頁會執行其一般生命週期的修改的版本，以處理回呼。The Web page runs a modified version of its normal life cycle to process the callback. 使用方法，以取得用戶端函式的參考，叫用時，會起始伺服器事件的用戶端回呼。Use the method to obtain a reference to a client function that, when invoked, initiates a client callback to a server event. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作用戶端回呼而不回傳](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). > [!NOTE] > 回呼指令碼將無法用在舊的瀏覽器不支援文件物件模型 (DOM)，以及它們需要 ECMAScript 已啟用用戶端上。Script callbacks will not work in older browsers that do not support the Document Object Model (DOM), and they require that ECMAScript is enabled on the client. 若要檢查瀏覽器是否支援回呼，請使用屬性，可透過存取屬性的內建 ASP.NET物件。To check if the browser supports callbacks, use the property, which is accessible through the property of the ASP.NET intrinsic object. 使用方法和方法，以定義用戶端的回傳事件。Use the method and the method to define a client postback event. 這些方法可讓用戶端指令碼函式，當叫用，會導致回傳至網頁伺服器。These methods enable client script functions, when invoked, to cause the server to post back to the page. 用戶端的回傳事件不同的是從用戶端回呼網頁完成一般生命週期，以處理用戶端回傳事件。A client postback event is different from a client callback in that the Web page completes a normal life cycle to process the client postback event. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用控制項和屬性設定為`false`，則您可以使用方法以傳回用戶端回傳事件控制項。If you are using a control and the property is set to `false`, then you can use the method to return the client postback event for the control. 屬性控制項，控制項和控制項可以用來執行用戶端指令碼。The property of the control, control, and control can be used to run client script. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method of the class. 頁中所定義的兩個用戶端指令碼： `PopupScript`，載入頁面時，顯示警示訊息和`ButtonClickScript`，而後者可定義用戶端的處理常式的 HTML 按鈕`onClick`事件。Two client scripts are defined in the page: `PopupScript`, which displays an alert message when the page is loaded, and `ButtonClickScript`, which defines a client handler for an HTML button's `onClick` event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1/cs/page_registerstartupscriptcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager1/vb/page_registerstartupscriptvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行的頻外回呼伺服器頁面的一般生命週期的已修改的版本。The method performs an out-of-band callback to the server that is a modified version of a page's normal life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作用戶端回呼而不回傳](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). > [!NOTE] > Microsoft Internet Explorer （5.0 或更新版本） 瀏覽器時，指令碼回呼機制透過 Microsoft.XmlHttp COM 物件實作，而且需要瀏覽器設為 執行 ActiveX 控制項。When the browser is Microsoft Internet Explorer (version 5.0 or later), the script callback mechanism is implemented through the Microsoft.XmlHttp COM object and requires the browser to be set to run ActiveX controls. 會使用其他瀏覽器，XMLHttpRequest 使用瀏覽器的本機文件物件模型 (DOM)。For other browsers, an XMLHttpRequest using the browser's local Document Object Model (DOM) is used. 若要檢查瀏覽器是否支援用戶端回呼，請使用屬性。To check whether a browser supports client callbacks, use the property. 若要檢查瀏覽器是否支援透過 HTTP 的 XML，請使用屬性。To check whether a browser supports XML over HTTP, use the property. 兩個屬性都可透過存取屬性的內建 ASP.NET物件。Both properties are accessible through the property of the intrinsic ASP.NET object. 多載方法會執行以同步方式透過 HTTP 使用 XML 的回呼。The overload of the method performs a callback synchronously using XML over HTTP. 當回呼案例中，以同步方式傳送資料，同步回呼就會立即傳回，而不會封鎖瀏覽器。When sending data synchronously in a callback scenario, synchronous callbacks return immediately and do not block the browser. 同步沒有兩個回呼可以在瀏覽器中同時執行。No two synchronous callbacks callback can execute at the same time in the browser. 如果第二個同步回呼一經引發，而另一個是目前有擱置中，第二個同步回呼取消第一個，並會傳回第二個的回呼。If a second synchronous callback is fired while one is currently pending, the second synchronous callback cancels the first and only the second callback will return. 若要以非同步方式傳送資料，請使用其中一個多載採用`useAsync`參數，這是布林值，以控制此行為。To send data asynchronously, use one of the overloads that takes the `useAsync` parameter, which is a Boolean value controlling this behavior. 在非同步案例中，您可以有多個暫止的回呼。不過，它們傳回的順序不會保證以符合它們初始化的順序。In the asynchronous scenario you can have multiple pending callbacks; however, the order in which they return is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were initiated. 此外，這個多載的方法會指定用戶端函式可處理所產生的錯誤狀況的情況方法。Additionally, this overload of the method specifies no client function to handle the case of an error condition generated by the method. 若要指定將用戶端錯誤回呼處理常式，請使用其中一個多載採用`clientErrorCallback`參數。To specify a client error callback handler, use one of the overloads that takes the `clientErrorCallback` parameter. 方法會採用選擇性字串`argument`參數並傳回字串。The method takes an optional string `argument` parameter and returns a string. 中傳送或接收多個值，串連輸入中的值或字串，會分別傳回。To pass in or to receive multiple values, concatenate values in the input or return string, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 請避免使用指令碼回呼作業期間需要更新的網頁或控制項屬性的實作中的檢視狀態。Avoid using the view state in the implementation of page or control properties that need be updated during script callback operations. 如果屬性不受網頁要求，您可以使用工作階段狀態。If the properties are to survive page requests, you can use session state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用兩個多載遞增整數的用戶端回呼案例中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use two overloads of the method in a client callback scenario that increments integers. 會顯示這兩個回撥機制;它們之間的差異，就是使用`context`參數。Two callback mechanisms are shown; the difference between them is the use of the `context` parameter. A`ReceiveServerData1`用戶端的回呼函式會使用提供`context`參數。A `ReceiveServerData1` client callback function is provided using the `context` parameter. 相反地，`ReceiveServerData2`用戶端的回呼函式定義於`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法會採用`target`字串參數，而不是參數。This overload of the method takes a `target` string parameter instead of a parameter. 當您想要回到以外的字串，包含回呼時，請使用此多載的控制項。Use this overload when you want the callback to go back to something other than a string containing the of the control. 此外，這個多載的方法需要`useAsync`和`clientErrorCallback`參數。Additionally, this overload of the method requires a `useAsync` and a `clientErrorCallback` parameter. `useAsync`參數可讓您以非同步方式將值設定為執行用戶端回呼`true`。The `useAsync` parameter allows you to perform the client callback asynchronously by setting the value to `true`. 這個方法的多載版本，不需要`useAsync`參數將值設為`false`預設。The overload versions of this method that do not require the `useAsync` parameter set the value to `false` by default. `clientErrorCallback`參數可讓您定義時所呼叫的用戶端函式名稱的伺服器處理常式，方法，這個方法會傳回錯誤。The `clientErrorCallback` parameter allows you to define the name of the client function that is called if the server handler, the method, returns an error. 這個方法的多載版本，不需要`clientErrorCallback`參數將值設定為 null。The overload versions of this method that do not require the `clientErrorCallback` parameter set the value to null. 如需有關這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱備註為多載方法。For more information on this method, see the remarks for the overload method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用兩個多載遞增整數的用戶端回呼案例中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use two overloads of the method in a client callback scenario that increments integers. 會顯示這兩個回撥機制;它們之間的差異，就是使用`context`參數。Two callback mechanisms are shown; the difference between them is the use of the `context` parameter. A`ReceiveServerData1`用戶端的回呼函式會使用提供`context`參數。A `ReceiveServerData1` client callback function is provided using the `context` parameter. 相反地，`ReceiveServerData2`用戶端的回呼函式定義於`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法需要`useAsync`和`clientErrorCallback`參數。This overload of the method requires a `useAsync` and a `clientErrorCallback` parameter. `useAsync`參數可讓您以非同步方式將值設定為執行用戶端回呼`true`。The `useAsync` parameter allows you to perform the client callback asynchronously by setting the value to `true`. 這個方法的多載版本，不需要`useAsync`參數將值設為`false`預設。The overload versions of this method that do not require the `useAsync` parameter set the value to `false` by default. `clientErrorCallback`參數可讓您定義時所呼叫的用戶端函式名稱的伺服器處理常式 (方法) 會傳回錯誤。The `clientErrorCallback` parameter allows you to define the name of the client function that is called if the server handler (the method) returns an error. 這個方法的多載版本，不需要`clientErrorCallback`參數將值設定為 null。The overload versions of this method that do not require the `clientErrorCallback` parameter set the value to null. 如需有關這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱備註為多載方法。For more information on this method, see the remarks for the overload method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回其 URL 參考的組件中內嵌資源。The method returns a URL reference to a resource embedded in an assembly. 傳回的參考不是 URL 編碼。The returned reference is not URL encoded. 資源可以是指令碼檔案、 影像或任何靜態檔案。Resources can be script files, images, or any static file. 您指定將用來存取資源的物件為基礎的類型。You specify the type based on the object that will be accessing the resource. 註冊頁面的 Web 資源是唯一識別由型別和名稱。A Web resource registered with the page is uniquely identified by its type and name. 使用指定的型別和名稱組合只能有一個資源可以向頁面。Only one resource with a given type and name pair can be registered with the page. 嘗試註冊已註冊的資源不會建立重複的已註冊的資源。Attempting to register a resource that is already registered does not create a duplicate of the registered resource. 方法用於搭配方法來存取的資源內嵌於組件。The method is used in conjunction with the method for accessing resources embedded in assemblies. 如需有關應用程式中使用的資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 網頁資源概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd)。For more information on using resources in applications, see [ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. *類型*在此範例中的參數設定為包含資源的組件中類別的類型。The *type* parameter in this example is set to the type of class in the assembly containing the resource. `resourceName`參數指定的資源，包括預設命名空間的完整路徑。The `resourceName` parameter is specified with the fully qualified path to the resource, which includes the default namespace. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4/cs/clientscriptwebresource.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4/vb/clientscriptwebresource.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計的方式套用中繼資料屬性來標記系統將會處理資源的組件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically apply the metadata attribute to mark the assembly for the resources that will be served. 編譯類別庫中的下列類別設定為預設命名空間`Samples.AspNet.CS.Controls`或`Samples.AspNet.VB.Controls`，視您使用何種語言。Compile the following class in a class library with a default namespace set to `Samples.AspNet.CS.Controls` or `Samples.AspNet.VB.Controls`, depending on what language you are using. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4/cs/resource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager4/vb/resource.vb#2)] 這個範例需要名為的 JavaScript 檔案`Script_include.js`。This example requires a JavaScript file named `Script_include.js`. .Js 檔案是包含的組件中的內嵌的資源`ClientScriptResourceLabel`物件。The .js file is an embedded resource in the assembly that contains the `ClientScriptResourceLabel` object. 如果您使用 Visual Studio]，在 [類別庫專案的 [屬性] 視窗中，設定**建置動作**至**內嵌資源**選取指令碼檔案時。If you are using Visual Studio], in the Properties window of the class library project, set **Build Action** to **Embedded Resource** when the script file is selected. 如果您正在編譯的程式庫，在命令列，請使用參數將內嵌資源。If you are compiling the library at the command line, use the switch to embed the resource. ``` function DoClick() {Form1.Message.value='Text from resource script.'} ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端指令碼包含可唯一識別索引鍵和其型別。A client script include is uniquely identified by its key and its type. 具有相同索引鍵和類型的指令碼會被視為重複。Scripts with the same key and type are considered duplicates. 指定的型別和索引鍵組合只有一個指令碼可以向頁面。Only one script with a given type and key pair can be registered with the page. 嘗試註冊已註冊的指令碼不會建立指令碼的重複。Attempting to register a script that is already registered does not create a duplicate of the script. 呼叫方法，以判斷是否包含具有指定索引鍵的用戶端指令碼和已註冊型別組，並避免不必要地嘗試要加入指令碼。Call the method to determine whether a client script include with a given key and type pair is already registered and avoid unnecessarily attempting to add the script. > [!NOTE] > 若要解決用戶端 URL，請使用方法。To resolve the client URL, use the method. 這個方法會使用內容呼叫它來解析路徑的 URL。This method uses the context of the URL on which it is called to resolve the path. 這個多載方法呼叫的多載， `key`、 `URL`，和`type`參數。This overload of the method calls the overload that takes a `key`, a `URL`, and a `type` parameter. 方法會將指令碼區塊所呈現頁面的頂端。The method adds a script block at the top of the rendered page. ## Examples 如需相關資訊，包括語法、 使用方式和範例，請參閱。For related information, including syntax, usage, and an example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法會採用*金鑰*和*url*參數來識別指令碼，以及`type`包括參數來指定用戶端指令碼的識別。This overload of the method takes *key* and *url* parameters to identify the script, as well as a `type` parameter to specify the identification of the client script include. 您指定將用來存取資源的物件為基礎的類型。You specify the type based on the object that will be accessing the resource. 比方說，當使用`Page`存取資源，您指定的執行個體`Page`型別。For instance, when using a `Page` instance to access the resource, you specify the `Page` type. > [!NOTE] > 若要解決用戶端 URL，請使用方法。To resolve the client URL, use the method. 這個方法會使用內容呼叫它來解析路徑的 URL。This method uses the context of the URL on which it is called to resolve the path. 這個方法所呈現頁面的頂端加入指令碼區塊。This method adds a script block at the top of the rendered page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 請注意，是否邏輯，以檢查是否有現有的用戶端指令碼包含已移除，仍不會重複的用戶端指令碼中所呈現頁面因為方法檢查是否有重複的項目。Note that if the logic to check for the existing client script include were removed, there would still not be duplicate client scripts in the rendered page because the method checks for duplicates. 檢查的好處是減少不必要的計算。The benefit of checking is to reduce unnecessary computation. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager2/cs/clientscriptincludes.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager2/vb/clientscriptincludes.aspx#1)] 這個範例需要名 Script_include.js 為具有下列內容的 JavaScript 檔案：This example requires a JavaScript file named Script_include.js with the following contents: ``` function DoClick() {Form1.Message.value='Text from include script.'} ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法註冊為指定的自訂 (expando) 屬性的名稱/值組。The method registers a name/value pair as a custom (expando) attribute on the specified . Expando 屬性設為以動態方式從 JavaScript 保留呈現的控制項的標記的 XHTML 相容性。The expando attribute is set dynamically from JavaScript to preserve XHTML compatibility for the rendered control's markup. 引號和自訂 (expando) 屬性的值中的反斜線逸出。Quotes and backslashes in the custom (expando) attribute's values are escaped. 如果您不想要逸出引號和反斜線，呼叫方法多載，並設定`encode`參數`false`。If you do not want to escape quotes and backslashes, call the overload method and set the `encode` parameter to `false`. 如果找不到 expando 屬性，或找不到要加入至 expando 屬性的控制項，仍發出用戶端指令碼，但它不會影響的控制項。If the expando attribute is not found or the control to add the expando attribute to is not found, the client script is still emitted, but it will not affect the control.

span.span: Registers the startup script with the object using a type, a key, a script literal, and a Boolean value indicating whether to add script tags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟動指令碼是唯一識別由其索引鍵和其類型。A startup script is uniquely identified by its key and its type. 具有相同索引鍵和類型的指令碼會被視為重複。Scripts with the same key and type are considered duplicates. 指定的型別和索引鍵組合只有一個指令碼可以向頁面。Only one script with a given type and key pair can be registered with the page. 嘗試註冊已註冊的指令碼不會建立指令碼的重複。Attempting to register a script that is already registered does not create a duplicate of the script. 呼叫方法來判斷是否已註冊啟動指令碼，具有給定索引鍵和類型配對，並避免不必要地嘗試要加入指令碼。Call the method to determine whether a startup script with a given key and type pair is already registered and avoid unnecessarily attempting to add the script. 中的這個多載方法，您可以指出是否在指令碼中提供`script`參數會包裝與`

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法和註冊回呼，以進行驗證和驗證回呼源自頁面的方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method and the method to register a callback for validation and to validate that the callback originated from the page. 若要改善的驗證，如下所示，您可以修改驗證`argument`參數，以包含特定的使用者，例如識別或角色資訊To improve on the validation shown here, you could modify the validation `argument` parameter to contain information specific to the user such as an identity or role [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager9/cs/EventValidationCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager9/vb/EventValidationVB.aspx#1)]
